pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, November 8, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, November 8, 2016:

Surrey, British Columbia

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with students at Simon Fraser University and will make an announcement.

Simon Fraser University
Surrey Campus
250-13450 102nd Street
Surrey, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for meeting with students and open coverage for announcement
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.
  • Open to accredited media. Accreditation will be issued upon arrival


Note: all times local


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
